Package ca.concordia.model

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Order
    Maintains the current order of the player.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Advance
    move armies between 2 neighbor countries
    AggressivePlayer
    Represents the Aggressive Player
    Airlift
    Airlift order, move armies between the territories of a single player which are not(or can be) neighbors.
    Attack
    attack from source country to destination country
    BenevolentPlayer
    Represents the Benevolent Player
    Blockade
    reinforces the number of armies inside the coutnry by 3 times.
    Bomb
    order to halve the number of armies of the opponents' neighbor territories
    Card
    card class
    CheaterPlayer
    Represents the Cheater Player
    ConquestMap
    class conquest map is to read the maps in the format of game Conquest.
    Continent
    This model has information regarding the continent
    Country
    Class Country : a class to store the attributes, methods, local variables for each Country in the game.
    Deploy
    place armies in the destination teritory
    Edit
    Abstract Class for Edit phase
    End
    Class deals with the endphase
    GameData
    Gamedata class
    GameStatus
    This class stores the status of the game.
    HumanPlayer
    Creates a player with the argument player name and sets default value for rest of the player fields.
    IssueOrder
    Deals with the Issue Order phase
    LoadGame
    LoadGame class
    LogEntryBuffer
    this class handles Observable concept of Observer pattern that defines the information about player's action To explicate more, observable prepares a buffer for logs which add logs through addlog() As a result observers can be notified
    MainPlay
    ConcreteState of the State pattern.
    MapEditor
    This is the main Map editor class, everything would be handled here.
    Negotiate
    prevent the first attack on the player if the defender has the Negotiation/Diplomacy card
    OrderExecution
    This class inherits MAinPlay class to override methods like Tournament, initiate some objects in its Constructor and to call printInvalidCommandMessage method for some methods such as issuing an order
    Phase
    State of the State pattern.
    Play
    Abstract method for play
    Player
    Represents a typical player.
    PlayerStrategy
    Strategy of the Strategy pattern
    PlaySetup
    This class inherits Play class and is responsible for functionalities such as setting players
    PostLoad
    PostLoad phase class which edits and does some other actions during the postLoad phase
    Preload
    This class loads map during the preload phase
    RandomPlayer
    Represents the RandomPlayer
    Reinforcement
    Reinforcement class to initiate some objects and print invalid msg command for some other methods
    SaveGame
    SaveGame class inherits Phase and initiates objects for saveGame
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Orders
    types of orders a player can issue
